clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: We use third party cookies ( see our separate cookie policy below ) such as those from Google analytics to obtain information on traffic to our site.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
We may use any information you give us;

  • to assist us in providing products and services to you including processing credit card information via a secure third party payment gateway such as Cybersource,
  • to record sales, accounting information, returns, updates and product development,
  • to comply with any regulatory or legal obligation we may have from time to time.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You have a right to request a copy of all the information we hold about you.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided
clauses.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.
clauses.clause_text:
The table below explains the cookies we use and why.

Name Purpose More Information

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
clauses.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.
clauses.clause_text: We keep this privacy policy under review

case.text: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

clauses.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: If you are not satisfied with our response or believe we are processing your personal data not in accordance with the law you can complain to the information commissioners office https://ico.org.uk

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
clauses.description: When you're not logged in to a service, but use it repeatedly, it may still feel weird that their terms and conditions can change between one use and the next. However, this does not violate the rule-of-thumb that each new version should be accepted from scratch, without inferring your acceptance from the acceptance of an earlier version. Since no acceptance is inferred from continued use, but only from current use, we rate this as neutral instead of bad.
clauses.clause_text: We keep this privacy policy under review and we reserve the right to update without notice.

case.text: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
